ARD Control Box: control node that allows inputing model, vae, prompts, allows you to change things like steps, cfg, latent width, height, and outputs many parameters to be used in your workflow
ARD Dual Prompt: inputs positive and negative prompts as string text and outputs positive and negative conditioning prompts
ard_integer_to_float: converts integer to float to be used in ARD math node
ard_math: simple math operations multiply divide add subtract on two input float variables and outputs integer and float outputs
ard_text_box: inputs text string and outputs text string
